verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deva patnamaa siyonu nee mahaatmya maaditam Aadithappa nattivaadu chese nin swadehamu guttameeda gattabadda nin gadaltu revvaru rakshanampu godalunna thruncha vachchu shatrulan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shashwathampu brema sooru jeeva vaari joodumu vaanchithambu lichchi needu lemulanni baapunu epdu paarune ritunda dappi gooru newadu nityamaa krupaa ghurambu kristu daatabolu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne siyonu vaasinaiti neni kristu satkrupan baadu kondu needu prema bhoomi gelichesinan aihi kambu sukhambu laanniyu yastirambulu Nityasoukhya mitchu swastyame siyonu biddalu aamen{/lang-eng}
